body_html: I agree @facaiy. While there is a workaround, this issue has still been triaged as a bug. Once we find the specific lines that need to be updated, it should be a relatively straightforward fix. I believe this kind of polishing is worth doing, because I can see how this could lead to mild frustration. I believe everyone should have positive experiences with TensorFlow and I'm grateful that you took the time to bring this to our attention.
